Jollibee Burger Steak Menu

Tender, juicy burger steaks served with rice and gravy. A Filipino comfort food favorite that's both filling and delicious, perfect for any time of the day.

Burger Steak Prices - June 2025 Updated

Experience the comfort of our tender burger steaks, perfectly seasoned and served with steamed rice and our signature mushroom gravy. A hearty meal that satisfies.

View Complete Burger Steak Menu

Regular Burger Steak

Single burger steak patty served with steamed rice and mushroom gravy. Perfect individual serving for a satisfying meal.

Order Now

Double Burger Steak

Two burger steak patties with rice and gravy for those with bigger appetites. Double the satisfaction, double the flavor.

Order Now

Burger Steak with Egg

Burger steak topped with a fried egg, served with rice and gravy. The addition of egg makes it extra hearty and delicious.

Order Now

Cheesy Burger Steak

Burger steak topped with melted cheese, served with rice and gravy. For cheese lovers who want extra richness in their meal.

Order Now

Burger Steak Combo

Complete meal with burger steak, rice, gravy, and your choice of beverage. Great value for a full dining experience.

Order Now

Family Burger Steak

Large serving perfect for sharing with family. Multiple burger steaks with rice and gravy for 2-3 people.

Order Now

Burger Steak with Vegetables

Healthier option with burger steak served alongside fresh vegetables, rice, and gravy for a balanced meal.

Spicy Burger Steak

For those who like it hot! Burger steak with spicy seasoning, served with rice and gravy for an extra kick.
